Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class ActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.Observer
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.ActionController
  • public class ActionController
extends Observer
    Handles the flow for an action. Supports MOVE, SHOT, GRAB, and RELOAD. At the start, clones the match into sandboxMatch to assure the player completes the full action before modifying the originalMatch

      • originalMatch

        private Match originalMatch
        Original match, kept without changes till the conclusion of an action.

      • sandboxMatch

        private Match sandboxMatch
        Sandbox match, created when an action starts. The original match gets restored with the changes once the action completes.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatch

        public Match getMatch()
        Description copied from class: Observer
        Gets the match that is being computed.
        Specified by:
        getMatch in class Observer
        Returns:

      • updateOnAction

        public void updateOnAction​(Action action)
        Handles receiving the chosen action from the player. Once called, it computes the action till the completion, using a sandboxed match to keep the model untouched until conclusion.
        Overrides:
        updateOnAction in class Observer
        Parameters:
        action - chosen by the curPlayer

      • updateOnWeapon

        public void updateOnWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        Handles receiving the chosen weapon from the player. Supported in SHOT, GRAB, RELOAD subAction.
      • In the SHOT action, uses the weaponController to process the selected weapon.
      • In the GRAB or RELOAD action, uses the PaymentController to start the payment.
Overrides:
updateOnWeapon in class Observer
Parameters:
weapon -

  • updateOnTiles

    public void updateOnTiles​(java.util.List<Tile> tiles)
    Handles the selection of tiles from the Client. Supported in MOVE action.
    Overrides:
    updateOnTiles in class Observer
    Parameters:
    tiles -

  • cloneMatch

    private void cloneMatch()
    Handles the cloning of the match, when the action starts. The original get restored, incorporating changes in the sandBox match, when the action is concluded or arrived at a conclusion checkpoint.

  • nextMove

    private void nextMove()
    Process a move, prompting the curPlayer with the possible Tiles to move on. If the selectable Tiles size are unique, the choice is made automatically. If the selectable Tiles are empty, the next step is made.

  • nextGrab

    private void nextGrab()
    Compute a GRAB action Supports:
  • Grabbing a weapon, discarding a weapon if weapons are already maxed out according to the defined limit, if the Tile is a spawnTile
  • Grabbing an AmmoCard from the tile

  • nextStep

    private void nextStep()
    Handles a generic step, parsing the current subAction from curAction. Supports the subActions:
  • Move, using the related method nextMove()
  • Shoot, prompting the weapon to use to the client, using the WeaponController
  • Grab, using the related method nextGrab()
  • Reload,

  • startPayingProcess

    private void startPayingProcess()
    Handles the start of the payment process, using the PaymentController. Doesn't support "ANY" keyword.

  • concludePayment

    public void concludePayment()
    After the payment is being made, parse the current subAction to process it, and calls nextStep.
    Overrides:
    concludePayment in class Observer

  • updateOnConclusion

    public void updateOnConclusion()
    It handles the conclusion of an action, or a WeaponController compute. Passes to the next step.
    Overrides:
    updateOnConclusion in class Observer

  • updateOnStopSelection

    public void updateOnStopSelection​(ThreeState skip)
    Handles the lack of a choice from the player. No non-reverse stop are supported in ActionController.
    Overrides:
    updateOnStopSelection in class Observer
    Parameters:
    skip -

    public WeaponController getWeaponController()
